tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Lectures were super long and always cut them short due to time. Did not take the time to get to know students and seemed like he didn\'t care about how they did in the class. Only grades were tests. Gives a study guide but also says that there may be things that aren\'t on there on the test. I had like 60 pages of notes for each test to look over.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Took this class on a MWF schedule and he is used to TTh, so his lectures were cut short each day. He didn\'t post notes, and if you asked him to go back a slide he would be stressed and agitated. He also had online things you had to read and watch, including the book, which I didn\'t get. Lot of work for 200 level. I did really like the material.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Very fast lecturer who does not post power points online. Only grades in the class are 4 tests.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Very good teacher. Clear speaker, although he speaks a bit fast. Would take again.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: He moves way too fast. He gives way too much work online and I bet that he would never get these lectures finished in an actual class hour. It was hard even interacting with him through emails.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: If you attended class and take notes, along with reading the text book you will be fine. Also he puts out a study guide, go through it with the book and your notes and you will get good a good grade.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: He lectures very quickly, even when you ask him to slow down. He doesn\'t post notes, you just need to write/ type quickly. There is a lot of material, and at least 4-5 chapters are covered per test. The study groups are not helpful because the TA does them and she just reads the words of the study guide, and doesn\'t know the material.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: He was a good teacher, really enjoyed what he talked about, and you can tell. Reading the textbook helps out a lot. The best thing is if you ask for help (or study group) he will try and have one put together. The tests can get hard if you don\'t study but he makes the information interesting. Just remember study!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: I can\'t remember the last time I was awake for an entire lecture... his test format changes so you don\'t know how to study and he puts material online in addition to the lecture material so you get double the amount you would in any other class.
